related_post.text: Can one of you explain this line ? `if __name__ == __main__":` It\'s part of a tutorial I\'m following and I don\'t know why the guy is doing it. so_post.text: @tshirtman  This is a pretty good breakdown https://stackoverflow.com/questions/419163/whatdoesifnamemaindo
